file.name: spec.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.2"
info:
  title: Posix Gateway API
  description: Service API for the Posix Gateway
  version: "0.0.1"
servers:
  - url: http://{host}:{port}/api/v1
    variables:
      host:
        default: "localhost"
      port:
        default: "30456"
tags:
  - name: common
    description: Common API exposed by SCION services.
paths:
  /info:
    $ref: "../common/process.yml#/paths/~1info"
  /log/level:
    $ref: "../common/process.yml#/paths/~1log~1level"
  /config:
    $ref: "../common/process.yml#/paths/~1config"

Error: parse: parse spec: /info: referenced pathItem not supported
